easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the highest number of doom on a _Cultist_ enemy in play.
easyStandard.cultist: -2. Place 1 doom on the nearest _Cultist_ enemy.
easyStandard.tablet: -3. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is the total number of doom in play.
hardExpert.cultist: -2. Place 1 doom on each _Cultist_ enemy in play. If there are no _Cultist_ enemies in play, reveal another token.
hardExpert.tablet: -4. If you fail, place all your clues on your location.
